contentList.content: When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> is added twice to the damage.
The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by [1]. This effect can stack.

When attacking with a melee weapon you are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with and are wielding in both hands, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> take a -[1] penalty, but their damage increases by [2].

Your Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You gain Advantage on Saving Throws to maintain Concentration on a spell.

You can also use a reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.

Pick up an item or creature and throw it at a target, dealing additional damage and knocking it Prone.

Will cause a stack of Frenzied Strain on the barbarian.
Using Frenzied Strike adds a penalty to Attack Rolls every time, stacking so that you miss more often. This adds up until the end of your Frenzy.
Will cause a stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_FRENZY_BURNOUT">Frenzied Strain</LSTag> on the barbarian.
You can increase one of your abilities by 1, to a maximum of 20.
